mapper.insert: insert INTO review (REVIEW_NUM, GOODS_NUM, purchase_num, ,REVIEW_SUBJECT, REGIST_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENTS, member_id) values((select COALESCE(TO_NUMBER(max(review_num)), 0) + 1 from review), #{goodsNum}, #{purchaseNum}, #{reviewSubject}, sysdate, #{reviewContents}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: update review set REVIEW_SUBJECT = #{reviewSubject}, REVIEW_CONTENTS = #{reviewContents}, member_id = #{memberId}, REGIST_DATE = sysdate where GOODS_NUM = #{goodsNum} and purchase_num = #{purchaseNum}
